title: Signs and labels on cartons, crates, etc.
context: ยง147-77 Signs and labels on cartons, crates, etc. The signs and labels required by section 147-75 shall likewise be affixed to the cartons, crates, and cases containing eggs required to be marked as in the section provided. [L 1953, c 90, ยง1; RL 1955, ยง22-75; HRS ยง147-77]
